LanguageData.PRF.Settings.RequireReboot: Changes made here will require you to reboot the game before they take effect.
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.restartMessage: Any changes will restart your game when you press close.
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffHelpButton.Label: Disabe help button
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffSwapTexture.Label: Disable texture swap effect
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffDrawStatus.Label: Disable working status
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffDoEffect.Label: Disable recipe effects
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffStorageDefault.Label: Disable default storage settings
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffDsuDestroy.Label: Disable the item destruction function of DSU (Digital-Storage-Unit)
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffDsuDestroy.Desc: Disable the item destruction function of DSU (Digital-Storage-Unit)
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.DsuLimit.Label: Set DSU storage limit (Very high settings can cause lag)
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.DsuLimit.Desc: Set DSU storage limit (Very high settings can cause lag)
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.recipeDB.Label: Set range for Recipe Database
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffInfestation.Label: Disable infestation for T1/T2 miners (Makes the game easier)
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffInfestation.Desc: Disable infestation for T1/T2 miners (Makes the game easier)
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffMinerNerf.Label: Miners can mine all ore types (Makes the game easier)
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffMinerNerf.Desc: Miners can mine all ore types (Makes the game easier)
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffGrouping.Label: Disable some of the menu grouping / dropdown
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffGrouping.Desc: Disable some of the menu grouping / dropdown
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffFurnacefuel.Label: Disable fuel use on T1 Furnace
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffFurnacefuel.Desc: Disable fuel use on T1 Furnace
LanguageData.PRF.Settings.TurnOffCoalGen.Label: Disable natural coal generation
